metadata.description: Comprehensive English test dataset with 1000 up-to-date movie queries for TMDB RAG evaluation

categories.genre_recommendation: User asks for film recommendations by genre
categories.specific_film_info: User asks about specific film details (release date, plot, etc.)
categories.similarity_search: User asks for films similar to a specific title
categories.director_filmography: User asks about films by specific director
categories.actor_filmography: User asks about films featuring specific actor
categories.theme_search: User asks for films about specific themes/topics
categories.disambiguation: Queries with ambiguous terms requiring context understanding
categories.studio_recommendation: User asks about films from specific studios
categories.decade_era: User asks for films from specific time periods
categories.franchise_series: User asks about film franchises or series
categories.comparison: User compares two or more films

test_queries.query: Phim hay về tình yêu lãng mạn?
test_queries.ground_truth: Should recommend romantic films with emotional depth

test_queries.query: Avatar Fire and Ash ra năm nào?
test_queries.ground_truth: Avatar: Fire and Ash released December 2025, third film in James Cameron's Avatar series

test_queries.query: Phim nào giống The Shawshank Redemption?
test_queries.ground_truth: Should recommend redemption stories with similar themes
